name: 3DS Super Mario Maker Course Data File
summary: A CDTC file is a game data file used by Super Mario Maker for 3DS, a Super Mario level creator available for the Nintendo 3DS handheld gaming console. It contains binary course data specifying a user-created level, including objects, tiles, power-ups, and player and enemy placement. CDTC files also store settings and metadata , such as when the level was created.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
